channel.title: Nicole Scherzinger on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Nicole Scherzinger on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Building the Band’ Winner 3Quency Signs With Records and Columbia Records (Exclusive)
item.description: The three-member girl group were the winners of the Netflix competition series that aired earlier this summer.

item.title: ‘Building the Band’ Winner 3Quency Signs With Records and Columbia Records (Exclusive)
item.description: The three-member girl group were the winners of the Netflix competition series that aired earlier this summer.

item.title: ‘Building the Band’ Producers Talk Season 2 Hopes and Liam Payne Legacy: “He Saw His Own Experience Up There on Stage”
item.description: Cat Lawson and Alison Holloway discuss how the Netflix competition series came to fruition and filming with the late Payne: “He was gracious and at times nervous, because he wanted to get it right.”

item.title: ‘Building the Band’ Producers Talk Season 2 Hopes and Liam Payne Legacy: “He Saw His Own Experience Up There on Stage”
